title: Aubameyang Back In London?
description:
The FC crew reacts to Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang being linked with Chelsea and question if the Blues should be interested in a 33 year old striker who just signed with Barcelona in January. Plus, Arne Friedrich and Archie Rhind-Tutt join the show to preview Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich's opening matches as the Bundesliga opens this weekend.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Chelsea linked with Pierre Emerick Aubameyang; Barcelona to activate another economic lever?; Frankfurt vs Bayern preview
